verses.roman:
evaṁ naṣṭeṣu sarveṣu
kuleṣu sveṣu keśavaḥ
avatārito bhuvo bhāra
iti mene 'vaśeṣitaḥ

synonyms: evam—in this way; naṣṭeṣu—when they had been destroyed; sarveṣu—all; kuleṣu—the clans of the dynasty; sveṣu—His own; keśavaḥ—Lord Kṛṣṇa; avatāritaḥ—diminished; bhuvaḥ—of the earth; bhāraḥ—the burden; iti—thus; mene—He thought; avaśeṣitaḥ—remaining.
translation: When all the members of His own dynasty were thus destroyed, Lord Kṛṣṇa thought to Himself that at last the burden of the earth had been removed.
